query:

CHANGE COLUMN createdAt createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
CHANGE COLUMN updatedAt updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
CHANGE COLUMN uploadedAt uploadedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
